body:
I apologize that this is not really a post regarding Radiance but hopefully is still applicable to some users. 


Does anyone know of any professional daylighting groups or societies? Especially one that is geared toward the consultant? I am aware of the Daylighting Collaborative at the Energy Center of Wisconsin, however their membership pricing structure does not seem to be geared toward the independent consultant, but more toward larger manufacturers. I have asked them about changing their pricing structure, but they do not seem to want to budge. 


Would anyone be interested in starting such a group with me? Or in persuading the Daylighting Collaborative into changing their pricing structure? Email me directly at jilldalglish at yahoo.com 


Thanks 






Jill Dalglish, EIT, LEED AP 
www.dalglishdaylighting.com 
Dalglish Daylighting, LLC 




jilldalglish at yahoo.com
___
